title.rendered: Telefónica creates a collection of NFTs based on 114 unique drawings by Ferran Adrià

content.rendered:
Telephone launch this Thursday collection of 114 non-fungible tokens (NFTs) associated with a series of 114 unique drawings in digital format made by Ferran Adria that symbolize the history of culinary evolution.

In an official statement distributed by the company they indicate that each NFT is a exclusive digital copy of each drawingwhich is accompanied by a digital certificate of authenticity registered in the ‘blockchain’ (chain of blocks) that allows attributing and proving ownership of the content.

The collection was made by Ferran Adrià in 2013 and has been exhibited in prestigious galleries and international art fairs such as New York, Miami, Madrid or Buenos Aires, among other places. In them he develops the theory of culinary evolution trying to capture the genealogy of the beginnings of the gastronomic and break with them the usual story of the beginnings of humanity.

The company issues the NFTs through Trust OSa product developed and marketed by Telefonica Tech to make it easier for companies to interact with public and private networks of the ‘blockchain’.

The cost per NFT is 0.1846 ether, which is equivalent to approximately 500 euros and is sold through the elBullifoundation website or directly at OpenSea. All proceeds will go to elBullifoundation, a foundation that contributes to enhancing the gastronomic legacy created in elBulli throughout its history.

“This project reaffirms the mutual commitment that we established in 2010 with Telefónica as elBullifoundation’s technological ‘partner’. The evolution of humanity is linked to the evolution of cooking and technology and in this collection of NFTs we bring together all these elements to promote innovation as a transforming element of society”, says Ferran Adrià about the project.

For its part, from Telefónica they affirm: “We celebrate going hand in hand with Ferran Adrià in the first collection of NFTs from his personal collection of drawings. At Telefónica we are committed to continue exploring use cases in new technologies associated with NFTs, ‘blockchain’, Web3 and the metaverse that represent the enormous business opportunity that they mean for the different industries and sectors”.
